name: H
description: First USD1 GameFi token on BSC Official mascot of holding in the USD1 ecosystem Be patient. Don’t panic. HODL your HORSE ~ Norms say: “if you can’t hold, you can’t be rich” This mindset was first championed by CZ, the founder who led BSC to glory. Inspired by his vision of holding for generational wealth, “HODL” became more than a meme, it became a way of life for the crypto community. Especially on BSC, where builders and believers embraced the hold-and-build ethos. That’s why we introduce $H — a token that stands for true conviction. It's not just about holding; it's about building, educating, and leading others to understand the real meaning of HODL on BSC
